hero.headline:
We build the Future,
One System at a Time
hero.description: We're a boutique dev shop building permanent platforms for permanent success. From decentralized cultural systems to enterprise foundations, we transform bold ideas into technology used by millions of users around the world.

description: Our team has been growing into a bleeding edge dev shop that's structured into two synergistic units: Creators at Qwellcode Solutions build in symbiosiswith the Researchers at Qwellcode Labs.

This powerful mix of research and scalable software‚Äîused by vast amounts of users‚Äîallows us to build scalable software for the future, one robust platform at a time. We don't chase trends; we build permanent platforms for permanent success.

quote.text: We are tinkerers and builders who create projects that scale over decades.

services.title: What We Build

footer.text: This is just the beginning. We're building permanent platforms for a permanent future.

reviews.suptitle:
From 5,000 enterprise partners to 180K+ creators,
our systems power millions of users worldwide.
reviews.title: Trusted By Industry Leaders:

projects.title: BEGA
projects.shortDescription: Digital foundation powering Germany's largest furniture group.
projects.description: Digital foundation powering Germany's largest furniture group, ensuring unwavering quality for 5,000 partners.
projects.longDescription:
For BEGA, Germany's largest furniture group, we built a comprehensive digital foundation that serves as the backbone of their entire operation. The platform connects 5,000+ partners, handles complex B2B transactions, manages inventory across multiple warehouses, and provides real-time analytics.

Our enterprise architecture ensures 99.99% uptime, handles peak loads during promotional periods, and integrates with legacy ERP systems. The platform includes partner portals, order management, logistics tracking, and business intelligence dashboards that drive strategic decisions.

projects.title: TIXU
projects.description: Bringing ownership to live experiences. Creators get total control over their ticketing and revenue in the new ownership economy.
projects.longDescription:
Tixu reimagines event ticketing for the ownership economy. We built a platform that gives creators complete control over their ticketing, revenue, and fan relationships, eliminating traditional intermediaries.

The system includes smart contract-based ticketing, secondary market control, fan verification, and comprehensive analytics. Creators can implement dynamic pricing, create exclusive experiences, and maintain direct connections with their audience.

projects.title: zeroone
projects.shortDescription: Transforming audiences into collectors and digital footprints into fortunes.
projects.description: Turns every post into a unique digital asset. 180K+ creators and 4.5M+ assets transforming audiences into collectors and footprints into fortunes.
projects.longDescription:
Zeroone is revolutionizing the creator economy by turning every social media post into a unique, ownable digital asset. With 180K+ creators and 4.5M+ digital assets created, we've built the social layer for the ownership economy.

Our platform seamlessly converts traditional social content into blockchain-backed collectibles, enabling creators to monetize their influence directly. Advanced algorithms handle asset generation, rarity determination, and marketplace dynamics, while our UX makes blockchain invisible to end users.

projects.title: Codex
projects.shortDescription: The living archive of 10,000 Art DeCC0s.
projects.description: The living archive of 10,000 Art DeCC0s. Preserving and cataloging the decentralized creative commons for future generations.
projects.longDescription:
Codex is a comprehensive archive and catalog system for Art DeCC0s (Art Decentralized Creative Commons). We built a sophisticated platform that preserves 10,000 artworks with complete provenance, metadata, and cultural context.

The system implements advanced search, filtering, and discovery features, making the decentralized creative commons accessible to researchers, artists, and the public. Part of the mocaOS ecosystem, Codex represents our commitment to preserving digital culture for future generations.

projects.title: MOCA
projects.shortDescription: A decentralized museum preserving and showcasing the evolution of crypto art.
projects.description: A decentralized museum preserving and showcasing the evolution of crypto art. Building the cultural archive of Web3 with mocaOS, Codex, and Vibe Studio.
projects.longDescription:
The Museum of Crypto Art (M‚óãC‚ñ≤) is the world's first decentralized museum dedicated to preserving and celebrating crypto art. We built a comprehensive platform that archives the history of digital art on the blockchain, creating a permanent cultural record.

Our architecture integrates Web3 wallets, IPFS storage, and sophisticated curation tools that enable the community to actively participate in preserving digital culture. The platform features virtual exhibition spaces, artist profiles, and an extensive archive of historical crypto art movements. Through mocaOS, Codex, and Vibe Studio, we've created an open-source ecosystem for decentralized cultural memetics.

projects.title: variete.de
projects.description: The engine behind high-stakes entertainment, orchestrating shows for over a million visitors annually with precision and reliability.
projects.longDescription:
For GOP Variet√© (variete.de), one of Europe's premier entertainment venues, we built a comprehensive platform managing ticketing, reservations, show scheduling, and customer experience for over a million annual visitors.

The system handles complex seating arrangements, dynamic pricing, VIP packages, and integrates with venue management systems across multiple locations.

projects.title: Amber Island
projects.shortDescription: Web3-based whisky membership community bridging physical luxury and digital ownership.
projects.description: Innovative Web3 whisky membership platform where users mint NFT keys to access tokenized premium whisky bottles and exclusive community perks.
projects.longDescription:
Amber Island represents a pioneering experiment in merging physical luxury goods with Web3 technology. Developed for GHARAGE/Heinemann in 2022, the platform allows members to mint 'Amber Island Key' NFTs (0.15 ETH) to join an exclusive whisky community.

Members gain access to tokenized premium whisky bottles (including Glenturret 30YO and limited CryptoPunk Whisky), exclusive events, and unique community experiences. The technology integrates Meta Anchor‚Ñ¢ for authenticity verification and features 3D-printed bottles for special events.

Currently on strategic pause due to challenging market conditions in the spirits and blockchain sectors, but existing memberships remain valid and members can still access their benefits. The project demonstrates the potential for blockchain technology in luxury goods authentication and community building.

projects.title: POAP
projects.shortDescription: The foundational protocol for proof of attendance on Ethereum.
projects.description: The foundational protocol for proof of attendance on Ethereum. Seven years of building the decentralized foundation for digital culture.
projects.longDescription:
POAP (Proof of Attendance Protocol) is a pioneering Ethereum-based protocol that transforms event participation into blockchain-verified digital memories. Over seven years, we've built a robust infrastructure that has issued millions of POAPs worldwide, creating a decentralized record of human experiences.

Our work includes smart contract architecture, NFT infrastructure, and global scaling solutions that handle massive concurrent loads during major events. The protocol serves as the foundation for digital culture, enabling communities to build lasting connections through blockchain-verified participation.

projects.title: AGI
projects.shortDescription: On-premise AI assistants and German language models for enterprise applications.
projects.description: Research and development of on-premise AI assistants, including German-speaking models and document chatbots for secure enterprise deployment.
projects.longDescription:
Our AI research focuses on creating on-premise AI solutions that give organizations complete control over their data and AI capabilities. We've developed German language models using LeoLM 13B (built on Llama-2 architecture) specifically optimized for German-language understanding and generation.

Additionally, we've implemented German document chatbots using h2ogpt technology, enabling organizations to query their document repositories using natural language. These on-premise solutions are crucial for enterprises requiring data sovereignty, especially in regulated industries and government applications.

Our work ensures that powerful AI capabilities can be deployed without sending sensitive data to external cloud services, maintaining complete privacy and compliance with European data protection regulations.

services.title: Industry and Society
services.description: We build systems that last. For BEGA, we forged a digital foundation to power Germany's largest furniture group, ensuring unwavering quality for their 5,000 partners. For GOP Variet√©, we crafted the engine behind their high-stakes entertainment, orchestrating shows for over a million visitors a year..

services.title: Ethereum Ecosystem
services.description: Seven years ago, we began building the decentralized foundation for digital culture. Our early Ethereum work gave birth to POAP and the Museum of Crypto Art. Now, that mission continues through mocaOS‚Äîthe open-source operating system for decentralized cultural memetics. We are channeling our passion into the decentralized internet of culture.

services.title: Social Media
services.description: We're developers building the social layer for the ownership economy. Zeroone turns every post into a unique digital asset, with 180K+ creators and 4.5M+ assets already transforming audiences into collectors and digital footprints into fortunes. Tixu brings ownership to live experiences, giving creators total control over their ticketing and revenue. We're building the future of digital culture.

testimonials.author: BEGA Group
testimonials.text: Qwellcode built us a digital foundation that serves 5,000 partners with unwavering reliability. Their enterprise architecture is robust, scalable, and exactly what we needed to power the future of our business. They don't just build software‚Äîthey build systems that last.

testimonials.author: TIXU
testimonials.text: Tixu reimagines event ticketing for the ownership economy. Qwellcode gave us complete control over ticketing, revenue, and fan relationships. Their smart contract expertise and platform architecture eliminated traditional intermediaries and empowered creators.

testimonials.author: zeroone
testimonials.text: The ownership economy is here, and Qwellcode made it real. With 4.5M+ digital assets created, they've built a platform that transforms our audiences into collectors and turns our digital footprints into tangible value. Revolutionary work.

testimonials.author: Museum of Crypto Art
testimonials.text: Seven years building on Ethereum, from POAP to mocaOS. Qwellcode is pioneering the decentralized foundation for digital culture. Their technical depth in Web3 combined with real-world scale makes them the go-to team for serious decentralized systems.

blog.title: The Decentralized Internet of Culture
blog.author: Lisa Anderson
blog.excerpt: Seven years of building on Ethereum taught us that decentralized culture needs its own operating system. Explore how mocaOS is becoming the foundation for cultural memetics in Web3.

blog.title: From Audiences to Collectors: The New Creator Economy
blog.author: Mike Johnson
blog.excerpt: With 180K+ creators and 4.5M+ digital assets on Zeroone, we're witnessing the transformation of social media into an ownership economy. Learn how creators are building real value.

sections.heading: Liability for Content
sections.content:
As a service provider, we are responsible for our own content on these pages in accordance with ¬ß 7 para. 1 TMG (German Telemedia Act) and general laws. According to ¬ß¬ß 8 to 10 TMG, however, we are not obligated as a service provider to monitor transmitted or stored third-party information or to investigate circumstances that indicate illegal activity.

Obligations to remove or block the use of information in accordance with general laws remain unaffected. However, liability in this regard is only possible from the time of knowledge of a specific legal violation. As soon as we become aware of such legal violations, we will remove this content immediately.

sections.heading: Liability for Links
sections.content:
Our website contains links to external third-party websites over whose content we have no influence. Therefore, we cannot accept any liability for this third-party content. The respective provider or operator of the pages is always responsible for the content of the linked pages. The linked pages were checked for possible legal violations at the time of linking. Illegal content was not recognizable at the time of linking.

However, permanent monitoring of the content of the linked pages is not reasonable without concrete evidence of a legal violation. If we become aware of legal violations, we will remove such links immediately.

sections.heading: Copyright
sections.content:
The content and works created by the site operators on these pages are subject to German copyright law. Duplication, processing, distribution, and any kind of exploitation outside the limits of copyright require the written consent of the respective author or creator. Downloads and copies of this site are only permitted for private, non-commercial use.

Insofar as the content on this site was not created by the operator, the copyrights of third parties are respected. In particular, third-party content is marked as such. Should you nevertheless become aware of a copyright infringement, please inform us accordingly. If we become aware of legal violations, we will remove such content immediately.

projects.title: BEGA
projects.shortDescription: Digitales Fundament f√ºr Deutschlands gr√∂√üte M√∂belgruppe.
projects.description: Digitales Fundament f√ºr Deutschlands gr√∂√üte M√∂belgruppe, das unwankende Qualit√§t f√ºr 5.000 Partner gew√§hrleistet.
projects.longDescription:
F√ºr BEGA, Deutschlands gr√∂√üte M√∂belgruppe, haben wir ein umfassendes digitales Fundament gebaut, das als R√ºckgrat ihres gesamten Betriebs dient. Die Plattform verbindet 5.000+ Partner, verarbeitet komplexe B2B-Transaktionen, verwaltet Lagerbest√§nde in mehreren Lagerh√§usern und bietet Echtzeit-Analysen.

Unsere Architektur gew√§hrleistet 99,99% Verf√ºgbarkeit, bew√§ltigt Spitzenlasten w√§hrend Aktionszeitr√§umen und integriert sich in Legacy-ERP-Systeme. Die Plattform umfasst Partnerportale, Auftragsverwaltung, Logistik-Tracking und Business-Intelligence-Dashboards, die strategische Entscheidungen vorantreiben.

projects.title: TIXU
projects.description: Bringt Ownership zu Live-Erlebnissen. Kreative erhalten vollst√§ndige Kontrolle √ºber ihr Ticketing und ihre Einnahmen in der neuen Ownership Economy.
projects.longDescription:
Tixu denkt Event-Ticketing f√ºr die Ownership Economy neu. Wir haben eine Plattform gebaut, die Kreativen vollst√§ndige Kontrolle √ºber ihr Ticketing, ihre Einnahmen und Fanbeziehungen gibt und traditionelle Zwischenh√§ndler eliminiert.

Das System umfasst Smart-Contract-basiertes Ticketing, Kontrolle des Sekund√§rmarktes, Fan-Verifizierung und umfassende Analysen. Kreative k√∂nnen dynamische Preisgestaltung implementieren, exklusive Erlebnisse schaffen und direkte Verbindungen zu ihrem Publikum aufrechterhalten.

projects.title: zeroone
projects.shortDescription: Verwandlung von Zielgruppen in Sammler und digitalen Fu√üabdr√ºcken in Verm√∂gen.
projects.description: Verwandelt jeden Post in ein einzigartiges digitales Asset. 180K+ Kreative und 4,5M+ Assets verwandeln Zielgruppen in Sammler und Fu√üabdr√ºcke in Verm√∂gen.
projects.longDescription:
Zeroone revolutioniert die Creator-Economy, indem es jeden Social-Media-Post in ein einzigartiges, besitzbares digitales Asset verwandelt. Mit 180K+ Kreativen und 4,5M+ erstellten digitalen Assets haben wir die soziale Schicht f√ºr die Ownership Economy gebaut.

Unsere Plattform konvertiert nahtlos traditionelle soziale Inhalte in blockchain-gest√ºtzte Sammlerst√ºcke und erm√∂glicht es Kreativen, ihren Einfluss direkt zu monetarisieren. Fortgeschrittene Algorithmen handhaben Asset-Generierung, Seltenheitsbestimmung und Marktplatz-Dynamiken, w√§hrend unsere UX die Blockchain f√ºr Endnutzer unsichtbar macht.

projects.title: Codex
projects.shortDescription: Das lebendige Archiv von 10.000 Art DeCC0s.
projects.description: Das lebendige Archiv von 10.000 Art DeCC0s. Bewahrung und Katalogisierung der dezentralen Creative Commons f√ºr zuk√ºnftige Generationen.
projects.longDescription:
Codex ist ein umfassendes Archiv- und Katalogsystem f√ºr Art DeCC0s (Art Decentralized Creative Commons). Wir haben eine ausgekl√ºgelte Plattform gebaut, die 10.000 Kunstwerke mit vollst√§ndiger Provenienz, Metadaten und kulturellem Kontext bewahrt.

Das System implementiert erweiterte Such-, Filter- und Entdeckungsfunktionen und macht die dezentralen Creative Commons f√ºr Forscher, K√ºnstler und die √ñffentlichkeit zug√§nglich. Als Teil des mocaOS-√ñkosystems repr√§sentiert Codex unser Engagement f√ºr die Bewahrung digitaler Kultur f√ºr z√ºk√ºnftige Generationen.

projects.title: MOCA
projects.shortDescription: Ein dezentrales Museum, das die Evolution der Kryptokunst bewahrt und pr√§sentiert.
projects.description: Ein dezentrales Museum, das die Evolution der Kryptokunst bewahrt und pr√§sentiert. Aufbau des kulturellen Archivs von Web3 mit mocaOS, Codex und Vibe Studio.
projects.longDescription:
Das Museum of Crypto Art (M‚óãC‚ñ≤) ist das weltweit erste dezentrale Museum zur Bewahrung und Feier von Kryptokunst. Wir haben eine umfassende Plattform gebaut, die die Geschichte digitaler Kunst auf der Blockchain archiviert und eine permanente Kulturaufzeichnung schafft.

Unsere Architektur integriert Web3-Wallets, IPFS-Speicher und ausgekl√ºgelte Kurations-Tools, die der Gemeinschaft erm√∂glichen, aktiv an der Bewahrung digitaler Kultur teilzunehmen. Die Plattform bietet virtuelle Ausstellungsr√§ume, K√ºnstlerprofile und ein umfangreiches Archiv historischer Kryptokunstbewegungen. Durch mocaOS, Codex und Vibe Studio haben wir ein Open-Source-√ñkosystem f√ºr dezentrale kulturelle Memetik geschaffen.

projects.title: variete.de
projects.description: Die Engine hinter High-Stakes-Entertainment, orchestriert Shows f√ºr √ºber eine Million Besucher j√§hrlich mit Pr√§zision und Zuverl√§ssigkeit.
projects.longDescription:
F√ºr GOP Variet√© (variete.de), eine der f√ºhrenden Entertainment-Locations Europas, haben wir eine umfassende Plattform gebaut, die Ticketing, Reservierungen, Show-Planung und Kundenerlebnis f√ºr √ºber eine Million j√§hrliche Besucher verwaltet.

Das System verarbeitet komplexe Sitzplatzanordnungen, dynamische Preisgestaltung, VIP-Pakete und integriert sich in Venue-Management-Systeme an mehreren Standorten.

projects.title: Amber Island
projects.shortDescription: Web3-basierte Whisky-Mitgliedschafts-Community, die physischen Luxus mit digitalem Eigentum verbindet.
projects.description: Innovative Web3-Whisky-Mitgliedschaftsplattform, auf der Nutzer NFT-Schl√ºssel pr√§gen, um Zugang zu tokenisierten Premium-Whiskyflaschen und exklusiven Community-Vorteilen zu erhalten.
projects.longDescription:
Amber Island stellt ein wegweisendes Experiment dar, das physische Luxusg√ºter mit Web3-Technologie verbindet. Entwickelt f√ºr GHARAGE/Heinemann im Jahr 2022, erm√∂glicht die Plattform Mitgliedern, 'Amber Island Key' NFTs (0,15 ETH) zu pr√§gen, um einer exklusiven Whisky-Community beizutreten.

Mitglieder erhalten Zugang zu tokenisierten Premium-Whiskyflaschen (einschlie√ülich Glenturret 30YO und limitiertem CryptoPunk Whisky), exklusiven Events und einzigartigen Community-Erlebnissen. Die Technologie integriert Meta Anchor‚Ñ¢ zur Authentizit√§ts√ºberpr√ºfung und verf√ºgt √ºber 3D-gedruckte Flaschen f√ºr besondere Veranstaltungen.

Derzeit in strategischer Pause aufgrund herausfordernder Marktbedingungen in den Spirituosen- und Blockchain-Sektoren, aber bestehende Mitgliedschaften bleiben g√ºltig und Mitglieder k√∂nnen weiterhin auf ihre Vorteile zugreifen. Das Projekt demonstriert das Potenzial der Blockchain-Technologie f√ºr die Authentifizierung von Luxusg√ºtern und den Aufbau von Communities.

projects.title: POAP
projects.shortDescription: Das grundlegende Protokoll f√ºr Teilnahmenachweise auf Ethereum.
projects.description: Das grundlegende Protokoll f√ºr Teilnahmenachweise auf Ethereum. Sieben Jahre Aufbau der dezentralen Grundlage f√ºr digitale Kultur.
projects.longDescription:
POAP (Proof of Attendance Protocol) ist ein bahnbrechendes Ethereum-basiertes Protokoll, das Veranstaltungsteilnahmen in blockchain-verifizierte digitale Erinnerungen verwandelt. √úber sieben Jahre hinweg haben wir eine robuste Infrastruktur aufgebaut, die Millionen von POAPs weltweit ausgegeben hat und eine dezentrale Aufzeichnung menschlicher Erfahrungen schafft.

Unsere Arbeit umfasst Smart-Contract-Architektur, NFT-Infrastruktur und globale Skalierungsl√∂sungen, die massive gleichzeitige Lasten bei gro√üen Veranstaltungen bew√§ltigen. Das Protokoll dient als Fundament f√ºr digitale Kultur und erm√∂glicht Gemeinschaften, dauerhafte Verbindungen durch blockchain-verifizierte Teilnahme aufzubauen.

projects.title: AGI
projects.shortDescription: On-Premise KI-Assistenten und deutsche Sprachmodelle f√ºr Unternehmensanwendungen.
projects.description: Forschung und Entwicklung von On-Premise KI-Assistenten, einschlie√ülich deutschsprachiger Modelle und Dokumenten-Chatbots f√ºr sichere Unternehmensbereitstellung.
projects.longDescription:
Unsere KI-Forschung konzentriert sich auf die Entwicklung von On-Premise KI-L√∂sungen, die Organisationen vollst√§ndige Kontrolle √ºber ihre Daten und KI-F√§higkeiten geben. Wir haben deutsche Sprachmodelle mit LeoLM 13B (basierend auf Llama-2-Architektur) entwickelt, die speziell f√ºr deutsches Sprachverst√§ndnis und -generation optimiert sind.

Zus√§tzlich haben wir deutsche Dokumenten-Chatbots mit h2ogpt-Technologie implementiert, die es Organisationen erm√∂glichen, ihre Dokumenten-Repositories mit nat√ºrlicher Sprache abzufragen. Diese On-Premise-L√∂sungen sind entscheidend f√ºr Unternehmen, die Datensouver√§nit√§t ben√∂tigen, insbesondere in regulierten Branchen und staatlichen Anwendungen.

Unsere Arbeit stellt sicher, dass leistungsstarke KI-F√§higkeiten bereitgestellt werden k√∂nnen, ohne sensible Daten an externe Cloud-Dienste zu senden, und vollst√§ndige Privatsph√§re und Compliance mit europ√§ischen Datenschutzbestimmungen gew√§hrleistet.

David hat zu zahlreichen Open-Source-Projekten beigetragen und ist leidenschaftlich f√ºr saubere Architektur.

team.name: Emily Taylor
